description: An angry homeowner who's tired of receiving calls
Already upset about the process or previous experiences
typicalObjections: ["This is ridiculous!","I'm tired of wasting my time","Why is this so difficult?","This is your fault!"]

description: Wants to control everything and treats agent like an employee
speakingStyle: Commanding tone, gives orders, interrupts frequently
typicalObjections: ["I want this done my way","Do what I'm paying you for","I'm not asking, I'm telling you","Make it happen now"]

description: Completely lost in the process and needs hand-holding
speakingStyle: Many basic questions, seeks constant reassurance, hesitant
typicalObjections: ["I don't understand any of this","Can you explain that again?","What does that term mean?","I have no idea what I'm doing"]

description: Takes excessive time to process and make simple decisions
speakingStyle: Slow speech, repetitive questions, needs excessive details
typicalObjections: ["Can you go over that one more time?","I need to think about this more","Let me write all this down again","I'm just not ready to decide"]

description: Never fully present and constantly multitasking
typicalObjections: ["Wait, what were you saying?","I'm on another call, just send me an email","Can you speed this up?","I don't have time for this"]

description: Lets emotions drive all decisions and reactions
typicalObjections: ["I just can't handle this stress!","This is too overwhelming!","I'm having a panic attack!","This is the worst day ever!"]

description: Trusts no one and suspects hidden agendas everywhere
speakingStyle: Accusatory questions, searches for hidden meanings
typicalObjections: ["What are you really getting out of this?","I know you're hiding something","This seems too good to be true","Everyone is trying to cheat me"]

description: Thinks they know more than the professional
speakingStyle: Corrects agent, uses industry jargon incorrectly, talks down
typicalObjections: ["Actually, I know all about real estate","That's not how it works","I've done my research","Let me educate you"]

description: Plays the victim and avoids taking responsibility
speakingStyle: Whiny tone, avoids decisions, blames others
typicalObjections: ["This always happens to me","Nothing ever works out","Why does everything go wrong?","You need to fix this for me"]
["Hurry up!","We don't have all day","Can we move this along?","I need this done NOW"]

description: Wants to be friends and gets distracted by socializing
speakingStyle: Long personal stories, off-topic chatting, excessive friendliness
typicalObjections: ["Let me tell you about my grandkids","We should grab coffee sometime","Sorry, what were we talking about?","You remind me of my cousin"]

description: Shows little interest or engagement in the process
typicalObjections: ["Whatever you think","I don't really care","Just pick something","Is this almost over?"]
